header.title: Nice to meet you! I am Froes.
content: Also called Pedro, PF, or that nerdy design guy. I am a Designer and Developer graduated in Computer Engineering and currently working at Avenue Code.

Creativity has always been a passion of mine, and I'm excited to apply it in both designing and coding. In addition, I highly value being organized, and this helps me in documenting my designs and developing practical code.

1.text: Drawing is a passion that sprung at an early age. I’ve explored a lot of styles over the years and even sold some to pay for my pre-college prep course.

2.text: Started majoring in Civil Engineering, but that wasn’t working out for me. Went on to an academic exchange in Chicago and unleashed the developer inside as I started to learn to code.

3.text: Enrolled in Computer Engineering at CEFET-MG and leaned even more about software development. The course was ranked the 2nd best Computer Engineering graduation in Brazil in 2018.

4.text: Got into a scholarship on UI/UX where I could learn and explore more how to bring my artsy side to computing. Found myself as a designer and developer.

5.text: Started working at Avenue Code. This amazing company gave me room to explore Visual Design, UI and UX Design, and Front-end Development.

6.text: Matured inside the Avenue Code, and got to work with Email Design and designing for Marketing. Even launched my own Design System project inside the company!

7.text: I believe there's always room for growing and improving, so I'm eager to see what the future holds—and I'd be excited to team up and shape our stories together.
